review: Works well, nice UI....  Fast, smooth playback.  I'm a Roku & Chromecast user too.  So why did I add a Fire Stick?  Primarily to try the Fire 8.9 HDX mirror/Miracast capabilities and compare the Fire TV stick to my Chromecast & Roku 1st hand.  I'm the tech-geek for my extended family and like trying out different tools & toys.I'd net out the Fire TV Stick as an equivalent to Roku, but not really a breakout, better product.  It's nice to be able to mirror my Kindle 8.9 HDX, but the display mirroring connection is no where near a simple and smooth as a Chromecast connection.  I like the Fire stick, but it's just not "better than Roku", and it's not at all as simple and smooth as Chromecast.Here's the one use case where I'd recommend the Fire Stick. A Prime Account, Kindle Fire user who has no other media or display mirroring interests.
